scripts.rebuild: cd node_modules/ibm_db && sed "s/UNICODE',/&'DEBUG'/" binding.gyp > binding.debug.gyp && mv binding.gyp binding.old.gyp && mv binding.debug.gyp binding.gyp && IBM_DB_HOME=$(pwd)/installer/clidriver ../.bin/node-gyp rebuild --IS_DOWNLOADED=true && cd ../../
scripts.test: npm run deps:start && npm run test:only && npm run test:file:only && npm run deps:stop
scripts.docker:run: docker build -t t . && docker run --network="ibmdbissue_default" -v $(pwd)/test:/opt/app/test:ro -w /opt/app t
scripts.test:only:linux: npm run docker:run -- npm run test:only:base
scripts.test:file:only:linux: npm run docker:run -- npm run test:file:only:base
